title: Approximations from table of f' part - a

content.description: The function f is twice differentiable for x > 0 with f(1) = 15 and f''(1) = 20.Â Values of f', the derivative of f, are given for selected values of x in the table above.
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 1. Use this line to approximate f(1.4).

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
